input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Good morning. How are you?
output: 早上好。你们好吗？

output: （观众）很好。

output: 这次大会很棒，不是吗？

output: 整个活动让我深受震撼。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. In fact, I'm leaving.
output: 说实话，我都想提前离场了。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. There have been three themes running through the conference,
output: 本次大会贯穿了三个主题，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. which are relevant to what I want to talk about.
output: 这也与我要讲的内容息息相关。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. One is the extraordinary evidence of human creativity
output: 其一是人类创造力非凡的体现

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. in all of the presentations that we've had
output: 体现在我们所有的演讲中

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and in all of the people here;
output: 以及在场的每个人身上；

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. just the variety of it and the range of it.
output: 这种创造的多样性与广度。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. The second is that it's put us in a place
output: 其二是它让我们陷入一种境地

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. where we have no idea what's going to happen
output: 对未来可能发生的一切

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. in terms of the future.
output: 全然无法预知。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. No idea how this may play out.
output: 不知道这会如何发展。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I have an interest in education.
output: 我对教育很感兴趣。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Actually, what I find is, everybody has an interest in education.
output: 事实上，我发现， 每个人都对教育感兴趣。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Don't you?
output: 不是吗？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I find this very interesting.
output: 我觉得这很有趣。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. If you're at a dinner party, and you say you work in education --
output: 如果你在晚宴上， 说你在教育领域工作——

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. actually, you're not often at dinner parties, frankly.
output: 说实话，其实你并不常参加晚宴。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. If you work in education, you're not asked.
output: 如果你从事教育工作， 没人会来问你。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And you're never asked back, curiously. That's strange to me.
output: 奇怪的是，他们也永远不会再来问你。 这让我觉得很不可思议。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. But if you are, and you say to somebody,
output: 但如果真有人问，你对别人说，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. you know, they say, "What do you do?"
output: 你知道，他们会问："你是做什么的？"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and you say you work in education,
output: 你说你在教育领域工作，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. you can see the blood run from their face.
output: 你能看到他们脸上的血色瞬间褪去。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. They're like, "Oh my God. Why me?"
output: 他们会说，“天啊，为什么是我？”

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. "My one night out all week."
output: “这是我一周唯一的外出之夜。”

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. But if you ask about their education, they pin you to the wall,
output: 但如果你问到他们的教育问题， 他们会把你怼到墙上，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. because it's one of those things that goes deep with people, am I right?
output: 因为这是人们最在意的事情之一，对吧？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Like religion and money and other things.
output: 就像宗教、金钱和其他事情一样。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. So I have a big interest in education, and I think we all do.
output: 所以我对教育非常感兴趣， 我认为我们都是如此。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. We have a huge vested interest in it,
output: 我们对此有着巨大的既得利益，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. partly because it's education that's meant to take us into this future
output: 部分原因是教育本应带领我们进入

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. that we can't grasp.
output: 那个我们无法预知的未来。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. If you think of it,
output: 试想一下，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. children starting school this year will be retiring in 2065.
output: 今年刚入学的孩子们 将在2065年退休。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Nobody has a clue,

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. what the world will look like in five years' time.
output: 五年后的世界会是什么样子。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And yet, we're meant to be educating them for it.
output: 而我们却应该 为此教育他们。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. So the unpredictability, I think, is extraordinary.
output: 所以这种不可预测性， 我认为，是超乎寻常的。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And the third part of this is that we've all agreed, nonetheless,
output: 而第三点是 尽管如此我们都同意，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. on the really extraordinary capacities that children have --
output: 那些真正非凡的 孩子们所拥有的能力——

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. their capacities for innovation.
output: 他们创新的能力。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I mean, Sirena last night was a marvel, wasn't she?
output: 我是说，昨晚的Sirena真是个奇迹，对吧？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Just seeing what she could do.
output: 光是看她能做到的事。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And she's exceptional, but I think she's not, so to speak,
output: 她确实出类拔萃，但我觉得她并非， 可以说，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. exceptional in the whole of childhood.
output: 在整个童年阶段都如此特殊。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. What you have there is a person of extraordinary dedication
output: 你看到的是一个具有非凡奉献精神的人

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. who found a talent.
output: 他们发现了人才。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And my contention is, all kids have tremendous talents,
output: 而我的观点是， 所有的孩子都拥有惊人的才能，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and we squander them, pretty ruthlessly.
output: 而我们却无情地浪费了这些才能。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. So I want to talk about education,
output: 所以我想谈谈教育，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and I want to talk about creativity.
output: 以及创造力。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. My contention is that creativity now is as important in education as literacy,
output: 我认为在当今教育中，创造力 与读写能力同等重要，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and we should treat it with the same status.
output: 我们应当给予它同等的重视。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Thank you.
output: 谢谢。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. That was it, by the way. Thank you very much.
output: 顺便说一句，就这些。 非常感谢。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. So, 15 minutes left.
output: 那么，还剩15分钟。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. "Well, I was born ... "
output: "嗯，我出生在..."

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I heard a great story recently -- I love telling it --
output: 我最近听到一个很棒的故事—— 我很喜欢讲这个故事——

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. of a little girl who was in a drawing lesson.
output: 有个小女孩在上绘画课

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. She was six, and she was at the back, drawing,
output: 她六岁，坐在后排画画

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and the teacher said this girl hardly ever paid attention,
output: 老师说这女孩平时几乎从不专心

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and in this drawing lesson, she did.
output: 但在这节绘画课上，她却全神贯注

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. The teacher was fascinated.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. She went over to her, and she said, "What are you drawing?"
output: 她走到女孩身边， 问道：“你在画什么？”

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And the girl said, "I'm drawing a picture of God."
output: 女孩回答： “我在画上帝。”

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And the teacher said, "But nobody knows what God looks like."
output: 老师说：“可是没有人 知道上帝长什么样。”

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And the girl said, "They will in a minute."
output: 女孩说： “他们马上就会知道了。”

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. When my son was four in England --
output: 我儿子四岁时在英国——

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. actually, he was four everywhere, to be honest.
output: 实际上 他那时四岁 说实话 走到哪儿都是四岁

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. If we're being strict about it, wherever he went, he was four that year.
output: 严格来说 那一年无论他去哪里 都是四岁

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. He was in the Nativity play. Do you remember the story?
output: 他参加了耶稣诞生剧演出 还记得那个故事吗

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. No, it was big, it was a big story.
output: 不 这可是个大事件 是个重要故事

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Mel Gibson did the sequel, you may have seen it.
output: 梅尔·吉布森拍了续集 你可能已经看过了。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. "Nativity II."
output: 《耶稣诞生记II》。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. But James got the part of Joseph, which we were thrilled about.
output: 但詹姆斯得到了约瑟这个角色， 我们对此欣喜若狂。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. We considered this to be one of the lead parts.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. We had the place crammed full of agents in T-shirts:
output: 我们让整个场地挤满了 穿着T恤的经纪人：

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. "James Robinson IS Joseph!"
output: "詹姆斯·罗宾逊就是约瑟！"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. He didn't have to speak, but you know the bit where the three kings come in?
output: 他本不必开口 但你知道 三位国王出场的那段吗？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. They come in bearing gifts, gold, frankincense and myrrh.
output: 他们带着礼物登场 黄金 乳香和没药

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. This really happened.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. We were sitting there, and I think they just went out of sequence,
output: 我们当时坐在那儿 我觉得 他们只是把顺序搞乱了

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. because we talked to the little boy afterward and said,
output: 因为后来我们问那个小男孩

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. "You OK with that?" They said, "Yeah, why? Was that wrong?"
output: "你们觉得这样行吗？" 他们说， "可以啊，怎么了？这样不对吗？"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. They just switched.
output: 他们就直接换了。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. The three boys came in, four-year-olds with tea towels on their heads.
output: 三个小男孩进来，四岁大的孩子 头上顶着茶巾。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. They put these boxes down, and the first boy said, "I bring you gold."
output: 他们放下盒子，第一个 男孩说："我给你带来黄金。"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And the second boy said, "I bring you myrrh."
output: 第二个男孩说： "我给你带来没药。"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And the third boy said, "Frank sent this."
output: 第三个男孩说："这是弗兰克送的。"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. What these things have in common is that kids will take a chance.
output: 这些例子的共同点在于 孩子们都愿意冒险尝试。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. If they don't know, they'll have a go.
output: 即使不知道答案，他们也会试一下。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Am I right? They're not frightened of being wrong.
output: 对吧？他们不怕犯错。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I don't mean to say that being wrong is the same thing as being creative.
output: 我并不是说犯错就等于有创造力。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. What we do know is, if you're not prepared to be wrong,
output: 但我们知道的是，如果你不敢犯错，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. you'll never come up with anything original --
output: 你就永远不会有任何原创的想法——

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. if you're not prepared to be wrong.
output: 如果你不愿意犯错。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And by the time they get to be adults, most kids have lost that capacity.
output: 等孩子们长大成人， 大多数已经丧失了这种能力。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. They have become frightened of being wrong.
output: 他们变得害怕犯错。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And we run our companies like this.
output: 而我们也是这样管理公司的。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. We stigmatize mistakes.
output: 我们将错误污名化。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And we're now running national education systems
output: 而我们现在经营着 国家教育体系

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. where mistakes are the worst thing you can make.
output: 在这些体系中，犯错是最糟糕的事。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And the result is that we are educating people
output: 结果就是，我们现在的教育

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. out of their creative capacities.
output: 正在扼杀人们的创造力。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Picasso once said this, he said that all children are born artists.
output: 毕加索说过：所有孩子天生都是艺术家。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. The problem is to remain an artist as we grow up.
output: 问题在于长大后如何保持艺术家的本性。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I believe this passionately, that we don't grow into creativity,
output: 我对此深信不疑， 我们并非随着年龄增长而获得创造力，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. we grow out of it.

output: 更准确地说，是教育扼杀了创造力。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. So why is this?
output: 为什么会这样呢？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I lived in Stratford-on-Avon until about five years ago.
output: 五年前我还住在埃文河畔斯特拉特福。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. In fact, we moved from Stratford to Los Angeles.
output: 实际上，我们是从斯特拉特福搬到了洛杉矶。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. So you can imagine what a seamless transition this was.
output: 所以你可以想象 这一过渡真是天衣无缝。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Actually, we lived in a place called Snitterfield, just outside Stratford, which is where Shakespeare's father was born.
output: 实际上我们住在斯特拉特福郊外 一个叫斯尼特菲尔德的地方，那里是莎士比亚父亲的出生地。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Are you struck by a new thought? I was.
output: 你有想到什么新发现吗？我有。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. You don't think of Shakespeare having a father, do you?
output: 你从没想过莎士比亚也有父亲吧？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Do you?
output: 是吗？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Because you don't think of Shakespeare being a child, do you?
output: 因为你不会想到 莎士比亚也曾是个孩子，对吧？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Shakespeare being seven?
output: 七岁的莎士比亚？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I never thought of it.
output: 我从没想过

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I mean, he was seven at some point.
output: 但他确实也有七岁的时候啊

output: 他也坐在某个英语课堂里，不是吗？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. How annoying would that be?
output: 那该有多烦人啊？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. "Must try harder."
output: "必须更加努力。"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Being sent to bed by his dad, to Shakespeare, "Go to bed, now!"
output: 被他父亲赶去睡觉， 对莎士比亚说，"现在就去睡觉！"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. To William Shakespeare.
output: 对威廉·莎士比亚。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. "And put the pencil down!"
output: "把铅笔放下！"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. "And stop speaking like that."
output: "别再那样说话了。"

output: "这让大家都很困惑。"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Anyway, we moved from Stratford to Los Angeles,
output: 总之，我们从斯特拉特福搬到了洛杉矶，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and I just want to say a word about the transition.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Actually, my son didn't want to come.
output: 其实我儿子当时并不想来。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I've got two kids; he's 21 now, my daughter's 16.
output: 我有两个孩子；他现在21岁，女儿16岁。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. He didn't want to come to Los Angeles.
output: 他当时不愿意来洛杉矶。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. This was the love of his life, Sarah.

output: 他认识她才一个月。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Mind you, they'd had their fourth anniversary,
output: 不过说真的，他们已经庆祝过四周年纪念日了，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. because it's a long time when you're 16.
output: 因为对16岁的人来说这已经很长了。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. He was really upset on the plane.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. He said, "I'll never find another girl like Sarah."
output: 他说："我再也找不到 另一个像莎拉那样的女孩。"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And we were rather pleased about that, frankly --
output: 说实话，我们对此相当满意——

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. because she was the main reason we were leaving the country.
output: 因为她正是我们离开这个国家的主要原因。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. But something strikes you when you move to America
output: 但当你搬到美国

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and travel around the world:
output: 并环游世界时，会有一些事情触动你：

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. every education system on earth has the same hierarchy of subjects.
output: 全球每个教育体系 都有着相同的学科等级划分。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Every one. Doesn't matter where you go.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. You'd think it would be otherwise, but it isn't.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And in pretty much every system, too, there's a hierarchy within the arts.
output: 几乎在每个教育体系中都是这样， 艺术领域内存在等级之分。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Art and music are normally given a higher status in schools
output: 在学校里，艺术和音乐通常 被赋予更高的地位，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. than drama and dance.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. There isn't an education system on the planet
output: 世界上没有一个教育体系

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. that teaches dance every day to children
output: 会像教授数学那样

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. the way we teach them mathematics.
output: 每天教孩子们舞蹈。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Why?

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. We all have bodies, don't we? Did I miss a meeting?
output: 我们都有身体，不是吗？ 难道我错过了什么重要会议？

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Truthfully, what happens is, as children grow up,
output: 说实话，实际情况是， 随着孩子们逐渐长大，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. we start to educate them progressively from the waist up.
output: 我们开始逐步培养他们 从腰部往上。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And then we focus on their heads.
output: 然后我们专注于头部。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And slightly to one side.
output: 并且稍微偏向一侧。

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. If you were to visit education as an alien

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. I am a health psychologist,

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Let me start with the study that made me rethink my whole approach to stress.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. This study tracked 30,000 adults in the United States for eight years,

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. "Do you believe that stress is harmful for your health?"

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Okay.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. People who experienced a lot of stress in the previous year had a 43 percent increased risk of dying.

output: 研究人员估算在追踪死亡数据的

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. they were tracking deaths,

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. 182,000 Americans died prematurely,

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. not from stress,

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. that would makebelieving stress is bad for you

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. the 15th largest cause of death in the United States last year,

output: 毕竟我过去一直不遗余力地告诫人们

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. in a study designed to stress you out.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. Well, the lessons aren't about wealth or fame or working harder and harder.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. The clearest message that we get from this 75-year study is this:

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. We've learned three big lessons about relationships.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. The first is that social connections are really good for us,

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And the experience of loneliness turns out to be toxic.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. find that they are less happy,

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. and they live shorter lives than people who are not lonely.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And the sad fact is that at any given time,
output: 可悲的事实是，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. more than one in five Americans will report that they're lonely.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. so the second big lesson that we learned

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. It turns out that living in the midst of conflict is really bad for our health.

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. to produce these types of learning disabilities.

output: 在大脑的左右两侧，

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. And one way that we are approaching this at my sleep center

input: Translate the following English Transcript into Chinese. is not by using sleeping pills, by the way.
